channel.title: [Solved, Fixed in 8.2] can't update tor browser
channel.description:
when I running update tor browser it gives the message that
http://j6im4v42ur6dpic3.onion/tor-package-archive/torbrowser could not be reached possible reasons: -http://j6im4v42ur6dpic3.onion/tor-package-archive/torbrowser is down -download location changed please check:start menu - system - whonix check or in terminal: whonixcheck or in terminal with debugging: whonixcheck -v
I did each of above said and did sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade but it still keeps failing . who can help me ? thanks

item.title: [Solved, Fixed in 8.2] can't update tor browser
item.dc:creator: update123
item.description:
when I running update tor browser it gives the message that

http://j6im4v42ur6dpic3.onion/tor-package-archive/torbrowser could not be reached
possible reasons:
-http://j6im4v42ur6dpic3.onion/tor-package-archive/torbrowser is down
-download location changed
please check:start menu - system - whonix check
or in terminal: whonixcheck
or in terminal with debugging: whonixcheck -v

I did each of above said and did sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade but it still keeps failing . who can help me ? thanks

Read full topic
